messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] camping unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... for you to make it to Columbia, SC for the conference. It IS a hugoid UNschooling party!  I d love to.  I d love to go to unschooling conferences all
messages.messageBody:
>
> It's NOT a camping trip; but if you're thinking about traveling, I'd LOVE
for you to make it to Columbia, SC for the conference. It IS a "hugoid"
UNschooling party! <G>

I'd love to. I'd love to go to unschooling conferences all over the place.
Realistically, on our income, it's pretty unlikely. %^ (
Tia

~Kelly

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/25/2003 11:33:24 PM Eastern Standard Time, leschke@... writes:

> No, but I like it. I'd love to come to a big camping party, but I don't
> know how soon I'm likely to get down that way. The last
> time I was in the
> Bay Area, my older son was almost 2. Now he's almost 25.
> Tia

Tia,

It's NOT a camping trip; but if you're thinking about traveling, I'd LOVE for you to make it to Columbia, SC for the conference. It IS a "hugoid" UNschooling party! <G>

~Kelly
